CatDescriptText: Herman Alpern, haberdasher, 2176 Centre Avenue, was part of the Pittsburgher's Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 5, 1959, with question: "Do you believe Allegheny County Democrats and Republicans have selected their best candidates for public offices in past 10 years?" Answer reads: "I think so. But, I am not too well informed about either party."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Herman Alpern wearing eyeglasses and short sleeved plaid shirt, standing on sidewalk, possibly Centre Avenue, Hill District
